original_text: Good food and wine help us to laugh and to be happy. But you need to have money to buy everything. Good food and wine help us to laugh and to be happy. But you need to have money to buy everything. Good food and wine help us to laugh and to be happy.
korean_text: 잔치는 희락을 위하여 베푸는 것이요 포도주는 생명을 기쁘게 하는 것이나 돈은 범사에 이용되느니라

sentences.original_text: Good food and wine help us to laugh
sentences.korean_translation: 좋은 음식과 와인은 우리가 웃도록 도와줍니다

sentences.original_text: But you need to have money
